title: Stranded: A Snowstorn Romance
description: Previously published as "Stranded' By Anastacia K.When her car breaks down in the middle of a deserted road during a snowstorm, Jessica Cross finds herself all alone with no one to call for help. As the temperature plummets a handsome man appears, taking her with him to his remote cabin in the woods. Notorious ladies' man Bryan Hunt is never one to shy away from trouble and when he finds a half-unconscious woman inside of a crashed car he has no choice but to take her to the only place he doesn't want. His cabin.
author: Anastacia K.
